name: OneManSky
description:
Fly through the universe and be sure, that you will be the only one in this universe. All other players will play in a parallel universe, so you will never meet someone here.

Try to get the highest score!

This game will be delivered with the source code and is CC0. I did it in less than 2 hours for the 100 lines of code gamemaker game jam: https://itch.io/jam/100-lines-of-code-gamemaker-game-jam

Controls:

W & S or ArrowUp & ArrowDown for moving
Space for shooting

I used GM:S 1.4x
